posts.message:
Title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer 
Job Description:
• Test results analysis.
• Test automation implementation.
• Development of test processes to improve test efficiency.
• Root cause analysis of software and hardware related issues.
• Work with development engineers to drive to closure on problems found, including recreating failures and verifying fixes.
Qualifications:

o B.Sc. in Computer Science or related discipline.
o Minimum one years of testing experience.
o Fundamental knowledge of software development lifecycles.
o Microsoft SQL Server query building fundamental knowledge.
o Knowledge in testing tools and bug tracking is an asset.
o Knowledge in test automation is an asset.
o Experience in testing web applications.
o Excellent problem solving and trouble shooting skills.
o Strong organizational and time management skills with ability to meet tight time-lines.
o Ability to work and thrive in a physically disperse team environment.

To Apply, Send your CV to jobs@drbridge.com with “Software QA Engineer” in the subject

What if I tell you that, as a C# programmer, you can improve your productivity 3 times?

How?????

Coming soon.....

What is the best technical session you saw? I'm talking about all sides: the materials, the speaker, the slides, video quality, fun, etc.

Please post links to the sessions, and specify what you liked most about it.
Don't wait... this $9 offer expires in 72 hours! you'll access $5,000 worth of courses, books and expert guidance.

posts.message:
Guys, i want to introduce Pngine to you all 

Pngine is a platform to share and organize your shares over social networks. 

you can easily share and organize your photos, posts and articles over social networks and see how people interact with it. 

Give it a try and feedback us, we are really excited to know how you see it.

posts.message: Recommending VPS for Linux with SSD and only $5/Month.

posts.description: Deploy an 512MB RAM and 20GB SSD cloud server in 55 seconds for $5/month. Simple, fast, scalable SSD cloud virtual servers.

posts.message:
Recommend me a good (better if cheap) ASP.NET MVC hosting company other than GoDaddy.
better if it's a cheap VPS, but shared hosting is possible as well.
what I need is SQL server DB, .NET 4.5, asp.net MVC 4 (I'll BinDeploy if not there).
yalaaaaaaaa :)
صباحكم NET Framework 4.5. يعني صباح مليان Features.... ;)

posts.description: Would it be wrong to assume that we fret more over our Facebook profile and status updates than with the same things on LinkedIn? At least, I think I do.
